ModMetadata.InGameDescription: <size="30"><color=#ffa500> IC10Sync </color></size> <color=#ff0000>This is a Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin.</color> See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad This mod runs a Httplistener along side the game providing a few endpoints to retrive information on the ic10 chips present in the game. GET endpoints: "list-chips" "chip-info/{refid}": "chip-dump/{refid}": "chip-code/{refid}": "chip-network-device-list/{refid}": "chip-mem/{refid}/{register | stack}/{addr}": POST endpoints: "chip-dump/{refid}" "chip-code/{refid}" "toggle-chip-power/{refid}" "chip-mem/{refid}/{register | stack}/{addr}"
